name: Zane
description:
What is Zane ?

Zane is harmony.

Absolute new logic game with unique game play and visual logic.
Everyone of 50 level has multiple beautiful solutions.

Find the balance of your inner Zane and reach harmony.

See in action
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rYZ9tGiaAb4

For the first 3 players who finish Zane in Harmony mode on hardest difficulty, we have free promo codes and exclusive chance to beta test our new games & apps.
